006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema;
007
008import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
009
010/**
011 * Represents constraint metadata that is common to all constraints that are
012 * targeted at a specific set of nodes matching the target.
013 */
014public interface ITargetedConstraintBase extends IConstraintBase {
015  /**
016   * The target to match to determine the nodes to check against the constraint.
017   * <p>
018   * If a target is not provided the the current context node is used as the
019   * target.
020   *
021   * @return the target or {@code null} if the default target is to be used
022   */
023  @Nullable
024  String getTarget();
025}
